Units.Unit_Name: Cleaning Of Glass Wares, Glp And Sterilization
Topics: Cleaning of glass wares, Microbiological good laboratory practice and safety.
Sterilization and assessment of sterility– Autoclave, hot air oven, and membrane filtration.
Media preparation: Liquid media, solid media, semi-solid media, agar slants, agar deeps, agar plates.
Preparation of basal, differential, enriched, enrichment, transport, and selective media preparation - Quality control of media, growth supporting properties, sterility check of media.
Pure culture techniques: Streak plate, pour plate, decimal dilution.
Culture characteristics of microorganisms: Growth on different media, growth characteristics, and description.
Microscopy: Light microscopy and bright field microscopy.
Staining techniques: Smear preparation, simple staining, Gram’s staining and endospore staining.
Study on Microbial Diversity using Hay Infusion Broth-Wet mount to show different types of microbes and hanging drop.

course_outcomes.1: Practice sterilization methods; learn to prepare media and their quality control.
course_outcomes.2: Learn streak plate, pour plate and serial dilution and pigment production of microbes.
course_outcomes.3: Understand Microscopy methods, different Staining techniques and motility test.
course_outcomes.5: Study on Microbial Diversity using Hay Infusion Broth-Wet mount
